# Last updated: 2026-02-18

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /private
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /*.xml$
Disallow: /api/

# Specific rules for search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: bingbot
Allow: /

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://mfdigitalstudio.com/sitemap.xml
